languages.text: "Если уж нам суждено погибнуть, давайте хоть повеселимся напоследок!"
"If we are doomed to die, we might as well enjoy ourselves one last time!"
languages.original_text: "Если уж нам суждено погибнуть, давайте хоть повеселимся напоследок!"

traits.locale_text: "If we are doomed to die, we might as well enjoy ourselves one last time!"
"If we are doomed to die, we might as well enjoy ourselves one last time!"
"If we are doomed to die, we might as well enjoy ourselves one last time!"
"If we are doomed to die, we might as well enjoy ourselves one last time!"

languages.text: “如果我们真的难逃一死，那不如在死之前好好开心开心！”
languages.original_text: "If we are doomed to die, we might as well enjoy ourselves one last time!"

traits.locale_text: “如果我们真的难逃一死，那不如在死之前好好开心开心！”

languages.text: 「死ぬ運命にあるのなら、最後に楽しんだ方がいいだろう！」
languages.original_text: "If we are doomed to die, we might as well enjoy ourselves one last time!"

traits.locale_text: 「死ぬ運命にあるのなら、最後に楽しんだ方がいいだろう！」

languages.text: «Si estamos condenados a morir, ¡por lo menos disfrutemos una última vez!».
languages.original_text: "If we are doomed to die, we might as well enjoy ourselves one last time!"

traits.locale_text: «Si estamos condenados a morir, ¡por lo menos disfrutemos una última vez!».

languages.text: « Si nous sommes condamnés, autant nous amuser un peu une dernière fois ! »
languages.original_text: "If we are doomed to die, we might as well enjoy ourselves one last time!"

traits.locale_text: « Si nous sommes condamnés, autant nous amuser un peu une dernière fois ! »

languages.text: "Wenn wir schon zum Sterben verurteilt sind, dann können wir uns auch genauso gut noch ein letztes Mal amüsieren!"
languages.original_text: "If we are doomed to die, we might as well enjoy ourselves one last time!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn wir schon zum Sterben verurteilt sind, dann können wir uns auch genauso gut noch ein letztes Mal amüsieren!"

languages.text: "Madem kaderimizde ölmek var, son bir kez daha keyfimize bakalım!"
languages.original_text: "If we are doomed to die, we might as well enjoy ourselves one last time!"

traits.locale_text: "Madem kaderimizde ölmek var, son bir kez daha keyfimize bakalım!"
